data.name: PX1000Fix
data.value: Fix PXAction handler signature

data.name: PX1000Title
data.value: Invalid PXAction handler signature

data.name: PX1001Fix
data.value: Create a graph instance by using the factory method

data.name: PX1001Title
data.value: A PXGraph instance must be created with the PXGraph.CreateInstance() factory method

data.name: PX1002Fix
data.value: Add the type attribute corresponding to the list attribute

data.name: PX1002Title
data.value: The field must have the type attribute corresponding to the list attribute

data.name: PX1003Title
data.value: Consider using a specific implementation of PXGraph

data.name: PX1004Fix
data.value: Consider changing the declaration order

data.name: PX1004Title
data.value: This order of view declarations will cause creation of two cache instances: {0} and {1}

data.name: PX1005Fix
data.value: Change the view delegate name to match the view name

data.name: PX1005MessageFormat
data.value: A possible typo in the view delegate name. The view name for this delegate: {0}

data.name: PX1005Title
data.value: A possible typo in the view delegate name

data.name: PX1006Fix
data.value: Consider changing the declaration order

data.name: PX1006Title
data.value: This order of view declarations will cause creation of one cache instance for the following DACs: {0} and {1}

data.name: PX1007Fix
data.value: Create a DAC instance by using the factory method

data.name: PX1007MessageFormat
data.value: An instance of {0} must be created with the PXCache<{0}>.CreateInstance() factory method

data.name: PX1007Title
data.value: A DAC instance must be created with the PXCache.CreateInstance() factory method

data.name: PX1008Title
data.value: Reference of @this graph in this delegate will cause synchronous delegate execution

data.name: PX1009Fix
data.value: Change the base type to a PXCacheExtension overload

data.name: PX1009Title
data.value: Multiple levels of inheritance are not supported for PXCacheExtension

data.name: PX1010Fix
data.value: Reset StartRow

data.name: PX1010Title
data.value: If a delegate applies paging in an inner select, StartRow must be reset (If StartRow is not reset, paging will be applied twice)

data.name: PX1011Fix
data.value: Mark the type as sealed

data.name: PX1011Title
data.value: Because multiple levels of inheritance are not supported for PXCacheExtension, the derived type can be marked as sealed

data.name: PX1012Fix
data.value: Change the type parameter of the action to the primary DAC ({0})

data.name: PX1012Title
data.value: The type parameter of the {0} action is not the primary DAC. You should specify the {1} DAC as the type parameter to make the action available on the toolbar.

data.name: PX1014Fix
data.value: Make the type nullable

data.name: PX1014Title
data.value: A DAC field must have a nullable type

data.name: PX1015TitleSuffixWithOnlyRequiredParams
data.value: The number of arguments passed to the {0} method does not match the number of BQL statement parameters. The number of required arguments is {1}.

data.name: PX1015TitleSuffixWithRequiredAndOptionalParams
data.value: The number of arguments passed to the {0} method does not match the number of BQL statement parameters. The number of arguments should be from {1} to {2}.

data.name: PX1018Title
data.value: The graph with the specified primary DAC type does not contain a view of this type

data.name: PX1021Title
data.value: The type of the DAC field attribute does not correspond to the property type

data.name: PX1021PropertyFix
data.value: Change the property type so that it corresponds to the attribute type

data.name: PX1023Title
data.value: The DAC property cannot be marked with multiple field attributes

data.name: PX1023Fix
data.value: Leave the selected field attribute and remove other field attributes from the property

data.name: PX1024Title
data.value: The DAC field type must be abstract

data.name: PX1024Fix
data.value: Make the DAC field type abstract

data.name: PX1026Title
data.value: Underscores cannot be used in DAC declarations

data.name: PX1026Fix
data.value: Remove underscores from the DAC declaration

data.name: PX1027Fix
data.value: Remove depricated field from the DAC declaration

data.name: PX1027Title
data.value: Field cannot be declared within DAC declarations

data.name: PX1028Fix
data.value: Remove all constructors entirely

data.name: PX1028Title
data.value: Constructors in DACs are strictly prohoboted
